title: Oxygen Sensor Calibration
description: The oxygen sensors in Bay 2 are showing irregular patterns. Study the transformation examples and apply the same logic to calibrate the faulty sensor grid.
hints: Look at how the non-black emojis change position between input and output.
The transformation swaps the positions of colored emojis diagonally.
Top-left colored emoji moves to bottom-right, bottom-right moves to top-left.
